price: 31. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Maxaa Qur’aankan loogu soo dejin waayey nin darajo weyn oo ka tirsan labada magaalo10?
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَتَيۡنِ عَظِيمٍ
footnotes: 10. Waxaa loola jeedaa labaadaa magaalo Makkah iyo Daa’if.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā nuzzila hādhā al-qur'ānu ʿalā rajulin mina al-qaryatayni ʿaẓīmin
